headline: Union Pacific’s Legendary Big Boy 4014 to Make Two Whistle-Stops in Colorado During Limited Fall Excursion
summary: OMAHA, Neb., September 18, 2025--Union Pacific Railroad's iconic Big Boy No. 4014, the world’s largest operating steam locomotive, will journey between Wyoming and Colorado later this month. The limited excursion will offer rail fans another opportunity to see the railroad’s rich history in action.

content.title: Union Pacific’s Legendary Big Boy 4014 to Make Two Whistle-Stops in Colorado During Limited Fall Excursion
content.summary: OMAHA, Neb., September 18, 2025--Union Pacific Railroad's iconic Big Boy No. 4014, the world’s largest operating steam locomotive, will journey between Wyoming and Colorado later this month. The limited excursion will offer rail fans another opportunity to see the railroad’s rich history in action.

thumbnail.caption: Union Pacific Railroad's iconic Big Boy No. 4014, the world’s largest operating steam locomotive, will journey between Wyoming and Colorado Sept. 30-Oct. 1.

headline: Utah’s first new railroad in a century opens at Lakeview Business Park
summary: Ribbon cutting (L-R) Savage President and CEO Jeff Roberts, Vice Chairman of Savage's Board of Directors John Savage, Charles Akerlow with Interstate Business Park, Savage's SVP and Rail Services Leader Mike Miller, Savage's VP of Business Development Phillip Hoskins, Josh Romney with The Romney Group, Jefferson Moss with the Governor's Office of Economic Development, Abby Osborne with the Utah Inland Port Authority, Nathan Anderson with Union Pacific Railroad and State Representative Nicholeen

content.title: Utah’s first new railroad in a century opens at Lakeview Business Park
content.summary: Ribbon cutting (L-R) Savage President and CEO Jeff Roberts, Vice Chairman of Savage's Board of Directors John Savage, Charles Akerlow with Interstate Business Park, Savage's SVP and Rail Services Leader Mike Miller, Savage's VP of Business Development Phillip Hoskins, Josh Romney with The Romney Group, Jefferson Moss with the Governor's Office of Economic Development, Abby Osborne with the Utah Inland Port Authority, Nathan Anderson with Union Pacific Railroad and State Representative Nicholeen

thumbnail.caption: (L-R) Savage President and CEO Jeff Roberts, Vice Chairman of Savage's Board of Directors John Savage, Charles Akerlow with Interstate Business Park, Savage's SVP and Rail Services Leader Mike Miller, Savage's VP of Business Development Phillip Hoskins, Josh Romney with The Romney Group, Jefferson Moss with the Governor's Office of Economic Development, Abby Osborne with the Utah Inland Port Authority, Nathan Anderson with Union Pacific Railroad and State Representative Nicholeen Peck joined together for a ribbon cutting photo during the event.

headline: RBC upgrades CSX, says shares gain under most rail merger outcomes
summary: Investing.com -- RBC upgraded CSX Corp to Outperform, saying the railroad is positioned to benefit under nearly any outcome from the proposed Union Pacific–Norfolk Southern merger. The brokerage also raised its price target on stock to $39 from $37.

content.title: RBC upgrades CSX, says shares gain under most rail merger outcomes
content.summary: Investing.com -- RBC upgraded CSX Corp to Outperform, saying the railroad is positioned to benefit under nearly any outcome from the proposed Union Pacific–Norfolk Southern merger. The brokerage also raised its price target on stock to $39 from $37.
